statements: SELECT * FROM knowledge_base_articles;
SELECT article_id, article_title, created_by FROM knowledge_base_articles;
SELECT article_title, created_at, last_modified_at FROM knowledge_base_articles;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base_articles WHERE created_by = 'Alice';
SELECT article_title, content FROM knowledge_base_articles WHERE last_modified_by = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base_articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT article_title, created_at FROM knowledge_base_articles WHERE created_by = 'Alice' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT article_id, article_title FROM knowledge_base_articles WHERE last_modified_by = 'Bob' AND content LIKE '%tutorial%' ORDER BY last_modified_at ASC;
SELECT article_id, last_modified_at FROM knowledge_base_articles WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND content IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base_articles WHERE article_title LIKE '%SQL%' AND (created_at < '2022-03-15' OR last_modified_at > '2022-03-20');
SELECT * FROM version_control_articles;
SELECT article_title, author, created_at FROM version_control_articles;
SELECT article_id, article_title FROM version_control_articles WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT * FROMrevision_history ORDER BY revision_date DESC;
SELECT revision_number, revision_notes FROM revision_history WHERE article_id='123-456-789';
SELECT article_id, article_title FROM version_control_articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM version_control_articles WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT article_id, author, last_modified FROM version_control_articles ORDER BY last_modified DESC;

SELECT article_id, article_title, revision_number FROM version_control_articles INNER JOIN revision_history ON version_control_articles.article_id = revision_history.article_id WHERE revision_number > 5;

SELECT article_id, article_title, revision_date FROM version_control_articles INNER JOIN revision_history ON version_control_articles.article_id = revision_history.article_id WHERE article_title LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY revision_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT author, created_at FROM articles ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT article_id, title, content, author FROM articles WHERE author = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users;
SELECT title, content, created_at FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT revised_content, revised_by, revision_date FROM revisions WHERE article_id = 1 ORDER BY revision_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT title, content, created_at, author FROM articles WHERE author = (SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1);
SELECT article_id, title, created_at, revision_number FROM articles JOIN revisions ON articles.article_id = revisions.article_id ORDER BY revision_date DESC, created_at;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM articles WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT author, created_at FROM articles ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT author_name FROM authors WHERE author_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT revision_date, revised_by FROM revisions WHERE article_id = 2 ORDER BY revision_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM articles;
SELECT title, content, author FROM articles WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT article_id, title, author FROM articles ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT r.revision_id, r.revision_date, r.revised_by, c.comment_text FROM revisions r JOIN revision_comments c ON r.revision_id = c.revision_id;
SELECT a.title, r.revision_date, c.comment_text FROM articles a JOIN revisions r ON a.article_id = r.article_id JOIN revision_comments c ON r.revision_id = c.revision_id WHERE a.author='Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM article_versions WHERE version_number > 3 ORDER BY revision_date DESC;
SELECT article_id, author_id, content FROM article_versions WHERE author_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT editor_name, email FROM editors WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT author_name, email FROM authors WHERE author_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT article_id, version_number, revision_date, content FROM article_versions WHERE article_id = '456e89b9-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY version_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM article_versions WHERE version_number > 5 ORDER BY revision_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT article_id, version_number, author_id FROM article_versions WHERE article_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000' ORDER BY version_number ASC

SELECT editors.editor_name, revisions.revision_date FROM editors JOIN revisions ON editors.editor_id = revisions.editor_id WHERE revisions.revision_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY revisions.revision_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT authors.author_name, authors.email, article_versions.content FROM authors JOIN article_versions ON authors.author_id = article_versions.author_id WHERE article_versions.version_number = 2

SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) as article_count FROM article_categories JOIN article_versions ON article_categories.category_id = article_versions.article_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING article_count > 3 ORDER BY article_count DESC
